class_notes:
(Same as SOC 240 1)
Course Description: 
This course aims to provide students with a statistical portrait of Black America. Together we will explore the economic, political, and social conditions of Black Americans. An emphasis is placed on developing an understanding of the contextual factors that produce the outcomes we review, as well as a parsing through of popular misconceptions about life for this group.  Topics covered will include class and socio-economic background, neighborhood and geographic context, education, and immigration, among others.
course_description:
This course aims to provide students with an empirical portrait of
Black America. Together we will explore the economic, political, and social conditions of Black Americans, with attention to the variety of social science methods used to study them.
